snippet: Judge C. Scott Crabtree on Wednesday struck down the state’s same-sex marriage ban, making it the 16th state to invalidate a prohibition on gay marriages in the past year.
abstract: Judge C Scott Crabtree strikes down Colorado's same-sex marriage ban, making it the 16th state to invalidate a prohibition on gay marriages in past year.
lead_paragraph: Judge C. Scott Crabtree on Wednesday struck down the state’s same-sex marriage ban, making it the 16th state to invalidate a prohibition on gay marriages in the past year.

headline.main: Judge Rules Against Colorado’s Ban on Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Judge Rules Against Colorado’s Ban on Gay Marriage
